controllers

Class Control

  • java.lang.Object
    • play.mvc.Results
      • play.mvc.Controller
        • controllers.Control
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    play.mvc.Http.HeaderNames, play.mvc.Http.Status

    public class Control
extends play.mvc.Controller

    Admin controller serving processes list and any other status informations about administrated supervisord instances.

    Author:
    Cédric Sougné
